changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table PERSONNES_COTISATIONS drop column annee_cotisation2

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table PERSONNES_COTISATIONS add season_id varchar(10)

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table PERSONNES_COTISATIONS add constraint PERSONNES_COTISATIONS_SEASON_FK foreign key (SEASON_ID) references SAISON(SAISON_ID)

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: create sequence PERSONNE_COTISATION_SEQ as bigint start with 100 increment by 1

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table personnes_cotisations add id bigint

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table personnes_cotisations add constraint personnes_cotisations_pk primary key (id)
